message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.HC 

The paper discusses the improvement of retrieval accuracy through the combination of multiple and diverse information object representations, which is a core topic in Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The use of subjective logic to formalize the potential suitability of each representation is related to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the polyrepresentation of different types of context, which is relevant to Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) and Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC).
